title: Circle Calculation Function
description:
CIRCLE_C calculates the arc length of an arc with the angle AX and radius
RX. If the angle is set AX = 360 so the circumference is calculated.
name: CIRCLE_C

input.name: Ax
input.description: The axis factor used in the calculation.

return_value.description: The computed value from the formula that involves the radius and axis factor.
